com.nickeson.games.cardgames

Class Dealer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nickeson.games.cardgames.Person
      • com.nickeson.games.cardgames.Player
        • com.nickeson.games.cardgames.Dealer

  • public class Dealer
extends Player
    Title: Dealer.java

    Project: Blackjack

    Description: Specific Dealer for Blackjack, provides ability to deal cards and play the Dealer's hand

    Copyright: Copyright (c) 2016

    Company: Silicon Mountain Technologies

    Since:
    May 17, 2016

    updates:

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    nickeson

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Dealer()
      no-arg constructor instantiates the Dealer (PC) as a Player
      Dealer(java.lang.String firstName, java.lang.String lastName)
      minimal constructor requires first & last name upon instantiating a Player/Dealer
      Dealer(java.lang.String firstName, java.lang.String lastName, int age)
      convenience constructor allows first and last name & age fields to be set upon instantiation of a Player/Dealer
      Dealer(java.lang.String firstName, java.lang.String lastName, int age, java.lang.String genderIdentity)
      convenience constructor allows first & last names, age and genderIdentity fields to be set upon instantiation of a Player/Dealer
      Dealer(java.lang.String firstName, java.lang.String lastName, int age, java.lang.String genderIdentity, java.util.List<java.lang.String> nickNames)
      constructor allows all Person fields to be set upon instantiation of Player/Dealer

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      play the Dealer's hand of 21 (specific rules for game_of_21)

      set the Dealer's account balance

      set the Dealer's lastName (variable inherited from Person.java)
      void setShoe(Shoe shoe)
      setup the Dealer's shoe of PlayingCards
      java.lang.String toString()
      Override the toString() method to print specific String when the Dealer is the PC and not a human Person/Player, otherwise print Dealer's field values as Strings, rather than hashcode
